title: 'Coach Walz' rallies Democrats with personal pitch to middle America
content: The running mate of Kamala Harris told the Democratic convention that voters should back "the right team" and "turn the page on Donald Trump".
summary: The running mate of Kamala Harris told the Democratic convention that voters should back "the right team" and "turn the page on Donald Trump".
